name: Rainbow Roots (8 frames)
description: @greweb's #4 plot loop. The 1920p animation is the main & digital art. There are 8 frames, one for each NFT edition. First buyer can collect which frame to acquire the physical art by the price segmentation (20.# is frame #. PM @greweb, ship anywhere in the world, frame # in buy order). Secondary market is digital only. plotted on A4 Bristol paper with 2 fountain pens each (rotates between 8 inks). See greweb.me/plots/143
